name: Joseph-code-project
body:
# Welcome to Joseph-code-project!
This website was designed for those who want to learn code.
## How to access this website:
1. Download the website .zip file and put in your personal server directory (Mac Users: Sites Folder; Windows Users that are running Apache Server: C:\dev\www).
2. Follow this link: [J/CP](http://jcoder.tk).

Questions?  Email me at [joseph@jcoder.tk](mailto:joseph@jcoder.tk).

Thanks, and enjoy!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
